overview: There's not a hard cock in sight, but that's not gonna stop this bunch of pussy-diving divas from enjoying life to the limits; as babe after horned-up babe takes their rightful place in this feverish cascade of chick-on-chick action. Using their tongues to delight and probe, these gorgeous beauties are soon hitting all the right spots - much to the sweet satisfaction of their dick-wielding audience, we're quite sure. title: Lesbian Temptation
